com.st.st25sdk.type5

Class STType5Sector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.type5.STType5Sector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface, SectorInterface

    public class STType5Sector
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheInterface, SectorInterface
    Defines methods to handle a STMicroelectronics Type5 sector tag

        nbOfBlocksPerSector - Number of blocks per sector

      • getSecurityStatus

        public byte getSecurityStatus(int sector)
                       throws STException
        Description copied from interface: SectorInterface
        Ask for the security status of the sector
        Specified by:
        getSecurityStatus in interface SectorInterface
        Returns:
        a byte according datasheet specs: b7:0 b6:0 b5:0 b4,b3 Pwd bits, b2/b1: r/w protection bits b0: sector lock
        Throws:
        STException
